name: typelens
description: Shows references to TypeScript methods in the form of codelens
author: Tamas Kiss

scripts.vscode:prepublish: npm run check && npm run build

commands.title: Show references into an output log

typelens.exclude.description: Array of patterns (in glob format) to exclude

typelens.excludeself.description: A flag which indicates whether the initiating reference should be excluded

typelens.blackbox.description: Array of glob patterns for blackboxed resources

typelens.decorateunused.description: A flag which indicates whether the initiating reference should be decorated if it is unsed

typelens.skiplanguages.description: Languages where the references should not be shown

typelens.blackboxTitle.description: Localization for the case where the only usages are from blackboxed sources

typelens.noreferences.description: Localization for the case when there are no references found

typelens.showReferencesForMethods.description: A flag which indicates whether to show references for methods

typelens.showReferencesForFunctions.description: A flag which indicates whether to show references for functions

typelens.showReferencesForProperties.description: A flag which indicates whether to show references for properties

typelens.showReferencesForClasses.description: A flag which indicates whether to show references for classes

typelens.showReferencesForInterfaces.description: A flag which indicates whether to show references for interfaces

typelens.showReferencesForEnums.description: A flag which indicates whether to show references for enums

typelens.showReferencesForConstants.description: A flag which indicates whether to show references for constants

typelens.showReferencesForVariables.description: A flag which indicates whether to show references for variables
